"Intensive Training at the White Summit":
"Yo! You came by at the right moment, <%me>!!
This time, let us be daring and go
to a cold place together! In relation to locations
with a poor foothold, I think that frozen soil
provides good training too. Go and accumulate
more fighting experience at Very Hard level!!
Of course, you have to clear it with an S-rank!
*Clear at S-Rank for Very Hard Difficulty
and above, travelling with Azanami only."

"やっほー！　そろそろ会えると思ってたよ。
さあ<%me>！
今度は思い切って、寒いとこへ行こう！
足場の悪い場所つながりで凍土なんか
またいい訓練になると思うんだよねー。
ベリーハードな実戦経験、もっともっと
積んじゃおうよ！
もちろんＳランククリア、でね！
※アザナミのみ同行、ブレイバー限定
ベリーハード以上、Ｓランククリア"
